text: is a Japanese football club which plays in J3 League. ==Club name== *1956-1990; Takasho OB SC *1991-1999; Kagawa Shiun FC *2000-2005; Sunlife FC *2006-present; Kamatamare Sanuki ==League position== *2011 : Football League - 11th *2012 : Football League - 4th *2013 : Football League - 2nd *2014 : J2 League - 21st *2015 : J2 League - 16th *2016 : J2 League - 19th *2017 : J2 League - 19th *2018 : J2 League - 22nd *2019 : J3 League - 14th *2020 : J3 League - 16th ==Other websites== *J.League Category:1956 establishments in Japan Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Kagawa Prefecture
